extendedInfo.description: Can you identify the state by name? Do you know all your States and Capitals? Test your knowledge of the States in Know Your States. A great quiz game for all ages. Learn the States as you play. Keep Score on how well you know your states.Choose from 5 different categories:* State's Name - Try to associate a picture of the State with its name.* State's Capital - Match the Capital to the correct state* State's Bird - Match the bird to the correct state* State's Flower - Match the flower to the correct state* State's Nickname - Match the nickname to the correct stateYou can choose from 3 different game types: * Choose the correct state from 4 different pictures.* Choose the correct state clue from the picture.* Flashcards - View different pictures of states to help you at identifying states.The score is based on the number of questions, the percent answered correct, and the time it takes to complete the quiz.Keywords: Quiz, Test, Trivia, School, Learn, Learning, United States, USA, States and Capitals, Scoreloop, Game, Flashcards

reviews.title: Simple but effective
reviews.comment: Not a Wikipedia look up like so many.  Good way of learning with flashcards,  and of quizzing with state maps.  Fun and educational
reviews.author: Jim Barton
